review.reviewBody: Best delivery pizza I've tasted so far in the city and I'm picky. So far I've had the Chipotle chicken and veggie pizza (added jalape√±os and pineapples). The garlic and hot sauces taste good quality. Highly recommend this place!
The dough was still raw.  Had to preheat the oven.
Pizza smells like old old oil, none of the toppings were cooked. Seems like they had an old pizza and threw some toppings and gave.
Undercooked, raw crust.  I made an order for pickup at a future time, which wasn't started until I arrived.  Then waited 27mins.  No apology, and very unprofessional.
Undercooked pizza, with raw crust.  if you preorder for a future time, they don't start your until you get to the store.
